item.title: Trump's tariffs incite fury in China and dismay in Europe

item.title: UK escapes worst of Trump's tariff wrath with 10% levy but warns of 'threat' to global economy
item.description: The U.K. escaped relatively unscathed compared with many other nations, facing the lowest trade tariff that Trump announced Wednesday.

item.title: Trump Media shares drop after warning the president's trust and other insiders could sell stock
item.description: Insiders and major stakeholders, including the Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust, can sell stock "from time to time," the company disclosed in a filing.
